text: Alicedes Escobar (born December 16, 1986 in La Sabana, Venezuela) is a Venezuelan baseball player. He currently plays as an infielder for the Kansas City Royals of Major League Baseball (MLB). Escobar formerly played for the Milwaukee Brewers from 2008-2010 before being traded along with Lorenzo Cain, Jeremy Jeffress, Jake Odorizzi for Zack Greinke and Yuniesky Betancourt. == Other websites == * Alcides Escobar at mlb.com Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Venezuelan baseball players Category:Kansas City Royals players Category:Milwaukee Brewers players
title: Alcides Escobar
